description: Environment Climate Change Canada will need facilitation services, as and when requested, to conduct facilitated engagement activities to support the delivery of the Net-Zero Advisory Body (NZAB) mandate. Engagement activities (activities include, but are not limited to, workshops, conferences, roundtables and special events) may include participation from the Canadian public, provinces and territories, municipalities, Aboriginal governments or organizations, youth, civil society, industry or other stakeholders, experts, including scientists and indigenous knowledge holders, and international bodies.
full_summary:
### Net-Zero Advisory Body Facilitation Consultant Services RFP Cancellation and Re-issuance

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01007505
**Date Published:** September 16, 2022

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Over Observed
**Procurement Category:** Service
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Limited Tendering

**Background:** Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has cancelled the RFP for Facilitation Consultant services to conduct engagement activities in support of the Net-Zero Advisory Body (NZAB) mandate. The cancellation is attributed to changes in specifications, and a new RFP will be issued within the next few weeks.

### Overview of the Requirement:

- **Scope:** The requiremnet involves facilitation services to conduct engagement activities to support the delivery of the NZAB mandate. Engagement activities include, but are not limited to, workshops, conferences, roundtables, and special events, which may involve participation from various stakeholders, experts, and indigenous knowledge holders.
- **Security Requirements:** There are no security requirements in this solicitation or the resulting contract.
- **Contract Period:** The proposed contract period is one (1) year from award, inclusive (October 2022 - September 2023), with an option to extend for up to four (4) additional one-year periods.
- **Required Services:** Facilitation Consultant services, including meeting facilitation and program support services.
- **Method of Procurement:** The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply, subject to quarterly refresh cycles.

### Important Information:

- **Notice of Cancellation:** Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has cancelled the RFP PW-22-01007505 for Facilitation Consultant services to conduct engagement activities in support of the NZAB mandate.
- **Contact Information:** Marie-Christine Blais at marie-christine.blais@ec.gc.ca
- **Associated Documents:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Regions of Opportunity:

- **National Capital Region (NCR)**

### Regions of Delivery:

- **National Capital Region (NCR)**

**Current Status:** Cancellation and Re-issuance

This announcement is extracted from:

- **Contracting Authority:** Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC).
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other trade agreements mentioned in the original entry.
